description: Try our easy to follow Indian Fish & Cauliflower Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Fish,High protein,High fibre,Sweet potato,Low fat,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Indian Fish & Cauliflower Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes until softened. Stir in curry powder, chilli, ginger, garlic and tomato paste and cook for 5 minutes until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir well to coat. Add lentils and water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 45 minutes.
Add fish, lemon rind and juice. Season with salt and pepper. Cook gently for 5 minutes. Ladle into bowls and top with beans and a dollop of yoghurt. Serve with sliced chilli, if you like.
